sentence.Network_en: His style could scarcely be further removed from that of his predecessor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的风格几乎和他的前辈如出一辙。

sentence.Network_en: All senior officers involved in the coup will have to be removed.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有参与政变的高级官员都将被免职。

sentence.Network_en: When not removed, plaque causes tooth decay and gum disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 牙斑如果不清除就会导致牙齿蛀蚀和牙龈疾病。

entry.def: If you say that an idea or situation is far removed from something, you mean that it is very different from it.

example.ex: He found it hard to concentrate on conversation so far removed from his present preoccupations...
example.tran: 他发现很难专注于谈话，因为谈话内容和自己目前的当务之急毫不相干。

example.ex: The country had witnessed scenes of tumult not far removed from civil war...
example.tran: 这个国家经历了无异于内战的动乱局势。

entry.def: If someone is your cousin once removed, they are your cousin's child or your parent's cousin.

means.word_mean: 1. taken out of or separated from;

sentences.sentence: "a hideaway far removed from towns and cities"

means.word_mean: 4. separated in relationship by a given degree of descent;

sentences.sentence: "a civilization ten centuries removed from modern times"

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes it's only when a difficulty is removed that we realise what it was doing for us.
Whether a deleted photo is immediately removed from the web.
Researchers at Cambridge University have found that nearly half of the social networking sites don't immediately delete pictures when a user requests they be removed
